channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of overflowing bins, 30th December
item.description:
The bins in the park all need emptied. Especially along the south side path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No space to put any rubbish in the bins, 30th December
item.description:
The rubbish has been building up over the Christmas period but not by the people who are supposed to use it. I have witnessed multiple houses emptying their entire bin waste either in the bins or on the floor. As someone with young children that are still in nappies it’s revolting not being able to put wasted nappies safely away where foxes and vermin won’t get it. I can give you the details of the flytippers and what houses they live at if you contact on 07301502953.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gavestone Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped blocking access to pavement, 30th December
item.description:
As title and continues down the Road beyond the next left turn.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hylton Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole of Keyes Road, 30th December
item.description:
The pavements and gutters are full of dry and compacted leaves. The road and gutters need sweeping please.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keyes Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in road as shown by location pin., 30th December
item.description:
This pothole is getting deeper and larger, caused by the trucks and lorries servicing the shops near Albany park station. When the trucks drive over the pothole it is causing my house to shake. In my opinion the pothole requires urgent repair to prevent structural damage to surrounding homes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Carisbrooke Avenue, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog waste bin needs emptying, 30th December
item.description:
This bin needs emptying please as full and waste accumulating around bin. Hasn't been emptied since before Christmas

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charter Drive, Albany Park, Greater London

item.title: Inco pads and food dumped, 30th December
item.description:
Dumped next to the bin! Contains food so will attract foxes and rats.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, litter and fallen branches, 30th December
item.description:
The standard of cleanliness on the road has deteriorated significantly in the last few months. Both Bourne Mead and Bourne Road have litter along them. But more specifically, there has been a fallen branch at the point marked for months, shopping trolleys dumped that have been there for weeks and general waste that appears to have been fly-tipped or just thrown out of a van / car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Mead, Crayford, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Every Bin is Full and Overflowing, 30th December
item.description:
Every litter bin in Betts Park is full and overflowing. They have not been emptied for a week. This isn't fair on Friends of Betts Park, who keep the park tidy; park users, who have nowhere to put litter; and Mick, the regular bin guy, who's going to return from holiday and be expected to catch up with a week's work in one day. Please empty the bins!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge and builders rubble has been dumped in parking space, 30th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millstream Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: 5 northchurch house, 30th December
item.description:
Reported before as well but still leaving rubbish outside the door. Even hackney cleaner is there for cleaning and he is leaving all stuff behind. I know it is not his job but he needs to report this too. Children living in this building but nobody care.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Split bin bags in middle of road from Hackney Council bin collection this morning, 30th December
item.description:
Several dropped (& now split/run over) rubbish bags from this mornings bin collection (at least 4 the length of Sandbrook Road) with food waste, hygiene products and other waste strewn throughout road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lilian Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken paving slab, 30th December
item.description:
There is a sunken paving slab outside home bargains where the drain pipe comes down. I have just fallen over due to it and Injured my ankle, knee, hands and elbow.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cray Avenue, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
